titlestmt.titleproper: Register of the Jeanne Marie Valentine Lambrino Papers, 1916-1956.
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff; machine-readable finding aid created by James Ryan.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-06-19T11:23-0700

change.item: June 19, 2014: Revised to add photograph card file information August 1, 2012: Revised to update encoding and add unitid March 23, 2004: PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Jeanne Marie Valentine Lambrino Papers)//EN" "reg_316.sgm" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

did.unittitle: Jeanne Marie Valentine Lambrino Papers
did.abstract: Memoirs, diaries, letters, notes, clippings, and photographs, relating to the marriage of J. M. V. Lambrino with Prince Carol and its subsequent annulment. Includes a diary about Prince Carol, 1919-1920.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Jeanne Marie Valentine Lambrino Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1973.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

did.unittitle: WRITINGS
Memoirs of Zizi Lambrino (four drafts in typescript, and three in handwriting), for her book Mon Marie, Le Roi Carol. Paris, C. Levy (1950). 168 p.
DIARIES, 1916-1921

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Diaries of Zizi Lambrino. Diary about Carol, Prince of Rumania.

did.unittitle: 6 diaries of Zizi Lambrino, 1916-1921 (in handwriting)
Diary about Carol, Prince of Rumania, December 14, 1919- December 6, 1920 (in handwriting)
CORRESPONDENCE, 1916?-1956

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence arranged alphabetically by last name of correspondent.

did.unittitle: Bratianu, C., letter to Zizi Lambrino, 28 January 1926
Carol, Prince of Rumania
Letters from Carol to Zizi Lambrino, 1917-1920 (with enclosures)
Letters from Zizi Lambrino to Carol, 1916?-1921
Ciocardia?, Georges, letters and postcards from "Georges" to Zizi Lambrino
Condeescu, General Adjutant N., letters to Zizi Lambrino, 1921
Cosacescu, J., letter to Zizi Lambrino, 9 August 1956
Dixon, T., letter to Carol (Mircea Carol, Zizi Lambrino's son), 21 August 1956
Eulalia, Princess of Spain, letters to Zizi Lambrino from Eulalia, Infanta of Spain, 1938-1953
Forrez, M., letter to Zizi Lambrino, 14 March 1926
Godart, L., letter to Zizi Lambrino, 9 March 1926
Jensen, Mrs. Lloyd, letter to Zizi Lambrino, 17 August 1921
Lamart, ? de, letter to Dr. Lund, Brazil
Lambrino, Euphrosine Letters from Zizi Lambrino to her mother, 1919-1920; Letters from Carol to Mrs. E. Lambrino, 1917
Lambrino, Loulou Letters from Zizi Lambrino to her brother "Loulou" Military postcards from Loulou to Zizi Lambrino
Lambrino, Mircea Carol, letter from Zizi Lambrino to her son Mircea Carol, 25 August 1947
Marie, Queen of Rumania
Letter from Carol to his mother, July 1919
Letter from Zizi Lambrino to Queen Marie, 1 July 1928
Letter and thank-you note from Queen Marie to "Madame (E.?) Lambrino" (Zizi's mother)
S. Marie Mathildes deTroy?, letters to Zizi Lambrino, 12 July 1914; 2 April 1916
Masouko, letters to Zizi Lambrino, 1950?
Miscellaneous correspondence: letters, telegrams, postcards, (undentified)
Nicolae, Prince of Rumania (brother of Carol), letters to Zizi Lambrino, 1917 (signed "Nicolae")
MISCELLANY

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Certificates, poems, clippings, calling cards, and miscellaneous printed matter, arranged as listed.

did.unittitle: Certificates; copy of annulment contract to marriage of Zizi and Carol, 3 July 1921; handwritten copies of letters
"Toi et Moi," poems by Paul Geraldy, booklet (copies in handwritten) with the inscription "Atroi! Souvenir d'epreuve, Signe d'esperance! Tassay 1918, Carol."
Three printed items on Rumania:
Observations Concerning the Draft Peace Treaty with Roumania, Paris 1946
"Realisations Sociales en Roumanie; la verite sur les reforms actuelles comparee aux resultats obtenus avant 1938," 1946
Beza, Marcu. Bessarabia and Transylvania. 1940
Miscellaneous clippings, calling cards, etc.
PHOTOGRAPHS

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: 15 photographs of Zizi Lambrino, her mother, her son Mircea Carol with his child, and others.
